name: Chaos Pind
description:
Its rural   British  India, and your village is invaded by strange creatures that came from the sky. 

"Goloo...Goloo", the whole village cried for you. As the defender of the  pind and its people, its your job to face the enemy.  

And how can Goloo do that without his    trusty old cricket bat...

Time to clean up the mess!

How To Play: Use the   WASD  keys to move around.  The character autofires, so  all you have to do is move to the right place. 

"Escape" to restart

Disclaimer: The game is unfinished and has bugs. Currently, there is no victory possible, if you survive ...nothing will happen.  The health regeneration is wonky and sometimes randomly takes chunks off your health bar.
